content.raw:
With libgazebo4-dev installed, I failed to reproduce the tutorial

```
#!bash
jrivero@nium gz_node_inst $  npm install gazebojs
 
> jpeg@2.0.0 install /tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs/node_modules/jpeg
> node-gyp configure build

make: Entering directory `/tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs/node_modules/jpeg/build'
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/jpeg/src/common.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/jpeg/src/jpeg_encoder.o
In file included from ../src/jpeg_encoder.cpp:1:0:
../src/jpeg_encoder.h: In constructor ‘JpegEncoder::JpegEncoder(unsigned char*, int, int, int, buffer_type)’:
../src/jpeg_encoder.h:12:20: warning: ‘JpegEncoder::data’ will be initialized after [-Wreorder]
     unsigned char *data;
                    ^
../src/jpeg_encoder.h:10:9: warning:   ‘int JpegEncoder::width’ [-Wreorder]
     int width, height, quality, smoothing;
         ^
../src/jpeg_encoder.cpp:3:1: warning:   when initialized here [-Wreorder]
 JpegEncoder::JpegEncoder(unsigned char *ddata, int wwidth, int hheight,
 ^
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/jpeg/src/jpeg.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/jpeg/src/fixed_jpeg_stack.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/jpeg/src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.o
In file included from ../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.cpp:8:0:
../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.h: In constructor ‘DynamicJpegStack::DynamicJpegStack(buffer_type)’:
../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.h:20:10: warning: ‘DynamicJpegStack::dyn_rect’ will be initialized after [-Wreorder]
     Rect dyn_rect; // rect of dynamic push area (updated after each push)
          ^
../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.h:19:9: warning:   ‘int DynamicJpegStack::bg_width’ [-Wreorder]
     int bg_width, bg_height; // background width and height after setBackground
         ^
../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.cpp:32:1: warning:   when initialized here [-Wreorder]
 DynamicJpegStack::DynamicJpegStack(buffer_type bbuf_type) :
 ^
In file included from ../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.cpp:8:0:
../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.h:19:19: warning: ‘DynamicJpegStack::bg_height’ will be initialized after [-Wreorder]
     int bg_width, bg_height; // background width and height after setBackground
                   ^
../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.h:17:20: warning:   ‘unsigned char* DynamicJpegStack::data’ [-Wreorder]
     unsigned char *data;
                    ^
../src/dynamic_jpeg_stack.cpp:32:1: warning:   when initialized here [-Wreorder]
 DynamicJpegStack::DynamicJpegStack(buffer_type bbuf_type) :
 ^
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/jpeg/src/module.o
  SOLINK_MODULE(target) Release/obj.target/jpeg.node
  SOLINK_MODULE(target) Release/obj.target/jpeg.node: Finished
  COPY Release/jpeg.node
make: Leaving directory `/tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs/node_modules/jpeg/build'

> png@3.0.3 install /tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs/node_modules/png
> node-gyp rebuild

make: Entering directory `/tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs/node_modules/png/build'
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/png/src/common.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/png/src/png_encoder.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/png/src/png.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/png/src/fixed_png_stack.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/png/src/dynamic_png_stack.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/png/src/module.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/png/src/buffer_compat.o
  SOLINK_MODULE(target) Release/obj.target/png.node
  SOLINK_MODULE(target) Release/obj.target/png.node: Finished
  COPY Release/png.node
make: Leaving directory `/tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs/node_modules/png/build'

> gazebojs@4.0.11 install /tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs
> node-gyp rebuild

make: Entering directory `/tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs/build'
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/gazebo/GZPubSub.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/gazebo/PubSub.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/gazebo/GazeboPubSub.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/gazebo/json2pb.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/gazebo/ConfigLoader.o
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/gazebo/OgreMaterialParser.o
  SOLINK_MODULE(target) Release/obj.target/gazebo.node
  SOLINK_MODULE(target) Release/obj.target/gazebo.node: Finished
  COPY Release/gazebo.node
make: Leaving directory `/tmp/gz_node_inst/node_modules/gazebojs/build'
gazebojs@4.0.11 node_modules/gazebojs
├── mocha@1.21.5 (escape-string-regexp@1.0.2, diff@1.0.8, growl@1.8.1, commander@2.3.0, jade@0.26.3, debug@2.0.0, mkdirp@0.5.0, glob@3.2.3)
├── node-gyp@1.0.2 (which@1.0.8, osenv@0.1.0, rimraf@2.2.8, graceful-fs@3.0.5, semver@4.2.0, fstream@1.0.4, mkdirp@0.5.0, nopt@3.0.1, npmlog@0.1.1, tar@1.0.3, minimatch@1.0.0, glob@4.3.5, request@2.51.0)
├── jpeg@2.0.0
└── png@3.0.3
jrivero@nium gz_node_inst $ node
> var gazebojs = require('gazebojs')
undefined
> var sim = new gazebojs.Gazebo()
undefined
> sim.pause()
undefined
```

What I'm doing wrong?
